Posts.EditableText:
Well you see, as you grow your hair, you go through a stage where you can't style it, which is when I usually give up and get it cut and styled again.

I'm a ladies man, and your hair style really affects the way your face looks, so I think it's a necessity to always have a good hairstyle, just incase.

When I grew my hair though, I was into gothic styles, I didn't care what other people thought, I was rebelling against the system, taking drugs, sleeping with dirty girls and getting drunk a lot.

I'll never go back to that life.

Posts.EditableText: *hands Zel a bottle of booze and a wig* YAAARRR! ... I'm just starting to realise that it doesn't matter too much, as long as you're comfortable with it - and have a brillient face structure like me . I think everyone has to go though a sort of 'getting to accept yourself' stage, where you go on a self-destruct mission. As long as it doesn't effect anyone else I see no problems with it. I've gone through that though, and just want to experiment with some stuff.. Might paint my nails some funky colours actually come to think of it!
